22g PROTEIN
Mousse

VANILLA BEAN PROTEIN MOUSSE

A light and airy vanilla bean mousse with 22g of protein. This elegant dessert is surprisingly easy to make.

22g
Protein
180
Calories
10m
Total Time
4
Yield

Nutrition per 1 serving

Carbs12g
Fat6g
Fiber1g
Sugar7g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 60g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 240g silken tofu, drained
  • 60ml unsweetened almond milk
  • 1 tsp vanilla bean paste
  • 5g stevia or other sweetener to taste

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Blend Ingredients

In a blender, combine the protein powder, silken tofu, almond milk, vanilla bean paste, and sweetener.

2

Blend Until Smooth

Blend on high until the mixture is completely smooth and creamy.

3

Chill

Pour the mousse into individual serving dishes and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to set.

4

Serve

Serve chilled, garnished with fresh fruit or a sprinkle of cinnamon.

5

Storage

Store any leftover mousse in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
